author: andreas
content:
Well, it's been daily. I've had some days when I was late, even two or three days at times, but in such cases I have caught up later with two, three or four images at one day.

Mostly the problem was not that I had no image for that particular day, but that I had been late post-processing them and writing the blog entries.

And ... hmm ... yes, the 300 was a 30. In Vienna I am living in KaiserstraÃŸe 30, and in the garden there is a shed with the #30 on it. I took the liberty to give it a boost by a magnitude ðŸ™‚

And ... no, I guess I could still learn a trick or two from Ted ðŸ™‚

Thanks for your support, after all: it is that feeling why we're doing it, right?

Andreas
